Ugandan Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung formed 
    Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The Ugandan Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Kampala on May 23.
 At the inaugural ceremony the minister of state for water, land and environment of Uganda was elected chairman of the committee.    
 The ceremony set a month of remembering Kim Il Sung from June 8 to July 8 and decided to conduct colorful functions including a memorial meeting, seminar, lecture meeting, photo exhibition and film show in the period.
